title: Admin Tables
description: Administrative interface for managing database tables, including CRUD operations on table records. Provides UI for viewing, creating, updating, and deleting records, as well as API endpoints for programmatic access.

specs.given: application is running
specs.when: user navigates to admin tables page

specs.given: application is running with configured tables
specs.when: user lists tables

specs.given: application is running with a table containing records
specs.when: user navigates to table records page

specs.given: application is running with a table containing searchable records
specs.when: user searches for records

specs.given: application is running with a table containing a record
specs.when: user opens a table record

specs.given: application is running with a table
specs.when: user creates a new record

specs.given: user is working with required fields
specs.when: user creates a table record with all required fields

specs.given: application is running with an existing record
specs.when: user updates the record

specs.given: application is running with an existing record
specs.when: user deletes the record

specs.given: user is working with missing required fields
specs.when: user attempts to create a record via POST without required fields
specs.then: request should fail with validation error

specs.given: application is running
specs.when: user creates a record via POST request
